response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This remarkable item holds immense value to me and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs, given its worth of $1,000,000 to you. I am offering this exceptional piece to you at a special price of $900,000. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am confident that this investment will bring you significant benefits and satisfaction.", "product_price": 900000}
